episode.title: Hey Bruh You Bumped Muh Hat
episode.rawTitle: 167: ‘Hey Bruh You Bumped Muh Hat’ With Jim Dalrymple
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Jim Dalrymple returns to the show, to discuss last week's Apple event in San Francisco, the iPhone 7 and 7 Plus, Apple Watch Series 2, and more.
episode.showNotes:
Jim Dalrymple returns to the show, to discuss last week’s Apple event in San Francisco, the iPhone 7 and 7 Plus, Apple Watch Series 2, and more.

Sponsored by:

  • Audible.com: With Audible, you’ll find what you’re looking for. Get a free 30-day trial.

Links:

  • The 1982 Chicago Tylenol murders and Johnson & Johnson’s handling thereof.
  • Jony Ive says “aluminium”.
  • My Periscope broadcast from the hands-on area at the event. Lots of special guest stars.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
